subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: Relatives of the former boxing champion Hector Camacho, who had been declared brain dead after being shot in the face, said they were still hoping for a miracle and said they would not remove him from life support.
snippet: Relatives of the former boxing champion Hector Camacho, who had been declared brain dead after being shot in the face, said they were still hoping for a miracle and said they would not remove him from life support.
